In July 2018, Jordan's congressional spokesman Ian Fury released a statement in which Ohio State wrestling coach [[Russ Hellickson]] reportedly said: "At no time while Jim Jordan was a coach with me at Ohio State did either of us ignore abuse of our wrestlers. This is not the kind of man Jim is, and it is not the kind of coach that I was."<ref>{{cite web |first=Tara |last=Goldshan |url=https://www.vox.com/2018/7/6/17536388/jim-jordan-ohio-state-sexual-abuse-accuser |title=Jim Jordan is accused of turning a blind eye to The Ohio State sexual abuse. Former wrestling team members David Range,<ref name="viebeck182"/> Mike DiSabato and Dunyasha Yetts asserted that Jordan knew of Strauss's misconduct.
